mapper.insert: insert into t_wms_storagecontant (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, STORAGEID, SKUID, QUANTITY, UNIT, SKUNAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_wms_storagecontant set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGEID = #{storageid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUID = #{skuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SKUNAME = #{skuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, STORAGEID, SKUID, QUANTITY, UNIT, SKUNAME from t_wms_storagecontant where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
